## Description

`HUAT-RRR` (**h**appy **u**sing **a**nd **t**eaching `RRR`)[^1] directs one to materials and resources for learning `Regression` analysis, `Research` methods, and `R` programming. To access this [website](https://yhpua.github.io/huatrrr/) offline, download the whole website from its {{< fa brands github size=1x  >}} [repository](https://github.com/yhpua/huatrrr).

 

[^1]: huatRRR <https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/huat_ah>
